1.5.1.name: wordpress/gbteamstats
1.5.1.description:
GB Team Stats is a plugin to enable competitive gamers whom use wordpress to pull their team stats into their blogs/sites to show off their pwning skills using GameBattles.

v2.0 Outlook

I'm not sure what else to add. If you have ideas, please visit (http://www.truimage.net/2008/09/gb-team-stats/) and leave some comments.
